availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Organized at Washington, D.C in January 1861. Commander(s): Captain J. Howard Carlisle, Lieutenant Samuel N. Benjamin, Lieutenant James S. Dudley, Lieutenant Samuel B. McIntire.

ab.bibl:
Frederick H. Dyer, A Compendium of the War of the Rebellion, (Des Moines, IA: Dyer Publishing Company, 1908), 1698.
Frank J. Welcher, The Union Army, 1861-1865, Organizations and Operations: Volume I, The Eastern Theater, (Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1989), 72, 160, 959, 997.
Frank J. Welcher, The Union Army, 1861-1865, Organizations and Operations: Volume II, The Western Theater, (Bloomington: Indiana University Press, 1993), 625, 901.
